Also #timstwitterlisteningparties tonight with Supergrass and The Coral just fully amplifying the feeling that in lockdown I have turned back into a nerdy teenager wigging out about records in my bedroom. Into it.

I remember getting very very into Black Wire as a teen and being v sad I never saw them. Then in 2013 (so long!) I got to put on their reunion gig (so good!). Now they've finally released their long-sat-on second LP. WHAT A TREAT https://t.co/mKbec5PjNm
